display_help: Bobcat spins and slashes around violently, attacking all nearby foes in a wide arc in front of him. Eviscerate is so deadly, that there is a chance of dealing extra damage!
display_short_help: Melee Cone Lethal, Very High DMG, Special
display_target_help: Bobcat spins and slashes around violently, attacking all nearby foes in a wide arc in front of him. Eviscerate is so deadly, that there is a chance of dealing extra damage!
display_target_short_help: Melee Cone Lethal, Very High DMG, Special
